documents.document: @lauraleslief1 I still want him to buy the remains of Manor, and now he can call it Project 4 (or 5!) if he wants.
@lauraleslief1 McLaren - Bruce, surely?
@thebuxtonblog More importantly, this clears the way for Ron to buy the remains of Manor and start Project 4 F1…
@theplumlinegs How long can we use that ‘personnel is policy’ line about Trump’s staff, do you think?
@lauraleslief1 @f1racing_mag Wow, that was a great year! (For Canadians, anyway.)
"Hey - I'm WALKING, here!" #surryhills #sydney #streetphotography https://t.co/8QgyNaWZP1 https://t.co/WlvVWj9cYw
@Rosspnz @stevebiddle "Running late"!? Have they ever HEARD of Axl Rose?! Fourteen years making a follow up album isn't even running late...
Australia's getting better at diverse hiring practices, but wow - @choiceaustralia CEO @AlanKirkland is...unexpecte… https://t.co/sa8clUxSmV
@domswildthings @theoneringnet @BillyBoydActor @orlandobloom @elijahwood I still can’t believe it’s been 15 years…! https://t.co/zGXIPb5nzU
If the twins are girls, she’s Beyonce, she’s Beytwice, she’s Beythreetimesalady. https://t.co/rzmo4IH5Vn
@lucethoughts (I suppose if the twins are girls, we may already be there.)
@lucethoughts Will we make it from Beyonce, to Beytwice, all the way to Beythreetimesalady?
This is actually quite sweet, and touching; and just what the world needs this week I reckon. Good on ya, Sam. https://t.co/Pqrr6C5taZ
@laureningram Isn’t there a record of your activities online? Sounds like someone went to the airport & back, or a ferry to Manly…
@mrjudkins (I do have a Kiwi passport of course, if you need someone to vouch something.)
@mrjudkins Are you an internet billionaire? Will you buy me a house in Wanaka?!
@deemadigan This week, it’s entirely impossible to guess who you’re referring to without looking at the article…
@markdistef He may have meant Steve Jobs, with that first one.
@yonatanzunger @TomPepinsky If Prince was still with us, Kremlinology would be one hell of an album. #prince #kremlinology
@AvardW Just how I remember it. All that open space is pretty much gone now, isn't it? Swallowed up by more retail opportunities?
@DendySydney: any chance of a Trainspotting / T2 double feature on opening weekend?
@jimmiorebro Am I the only one who finds the concept of this confusing, at best? Booze & paint = art class / team building?
@acnewman I always think of ROADKILL: ‘You can either play hockey, or take up a life of crime; and I have weak ankles, so, there you go.’
@cliffcardinal Great show tonight, thanks for bringing your story all the way here to us. Really appreciate it.
@amandaalguire2 @sallylinus @midgeure1 @torontostar Oh good - it sounded like they still needed to raise $150,000 to make that happen!
@sallylinus @midgeure1 @amandaalguire2 I read this more as ‘hoping’ to reopen March 3 - but still, good news! https://t.co/f2FdYiGbm5
@heyitstva Pretty sure I’ve got photos of her doing that at your wedding. Who knows what it means.
@rhiansheehan I should have guessed as much...!
@thehill Curious how the article calls the Dallas Stars an NBA team; though, that would have been an interesting game…
@MarkDiStef Also, for most Trump supporters, the flight from Moscow is quite long.
@MayorofShimtown Cheers Josh! Will you be in Melbourne in March? Not sure if I will yet, but you should have a tweetup (if that's a thing)!
@EricVespe Obviously a bit of a Great Escape pant-leg dirt-drop manoeuvre would work best.
@shawnmicallef (Of course, I remember shopping at MEC when it was next to the Reference Library, so I’m clearly old.)
@shawnmicallef Across Soho St from that biker bar!? Toronto’s changed, man!
@craignormanf1 We’ve already seen the grey uniform, so sadly, I think you’re probably right… https://t.co/5eLqK9Kxp7
@caniwikiwi That’s a fake account, I’m afraid - he’s not ryaldonaldtrump…
@hannah_bevis1 I saw Dan Carter do that to the British & Irish Lions, once - didn’t need the rest of the All Blacks! https://t.co/FzT5kk8Wli
Amazing collection of early theatre images from @statelibrarynsw - @RupertJulian would have played a few of these! https://t.co/YotsMYqBDt
Another favourite image from 2016 - see more on my blog! (Link in profile.) This one's fro… https://t.co/iIuY3UTBtq https://t.co/HOPb6tcrwN
@MayorofShimtown True. Can't picture Ron putting too many pay-drivers in his cars, though - wonder who was on his watchlist at McLaren.
@MayorofShimtown Interesting to contemplate who might drive for them, if Ron was running the show, though.
@MayorofShimtown I'd still rather see Ron Dennis wind up at Williams, then convince Honda to come over to them. Payback for 1988...!
@kb I like how they turned into an acapella group this year.
@ShentonStage @AudraEqualityMc @ezlusztig Is that from the script for Bob Roberts, or Wag The Dog? I can't remember.
@shawnmicallef If the antenna’s tall enough, maybe!
@shawnmicallef Beautiful downtown Leaside. We had a 26” Heathkit colour TV in 1968, but didn’t get cable until 2016. That’s how we roll.
@shawnmicallef On a clear night (rarely) we could pull in Rochester across the lake. But that was pretty rare…
@shawnmicallef Don’t tell my parents, they JUST got cable last year!
@shawnmicallef Better still - with a revolving antenna to get Buffalo stations more clearly…!
@shawnmicallef This is why they love my parents’ place so much, the only one left in Toronto with a TV antenna that’s easy to climb.
@mlle_elle But what he MEANT was, "what about me? It isn't fair!"
@Valdissima Did you try the pork roast? https://t.co/bVMFvq0OIS
@virginia_gay Also, this: https://t.co/VR1Eg0vcTH
@virginia_gay The full 38min video is great. We won’t see anything this classy from the White House in a while! https://t.co/cYM88xYAPk
@EliGP Or they cut & pasted last year's event runsheet...?
Worth is just for the hilarious Canadian accents. Everyone calling each other ‘buddy’. Classic. https://t.co/DDHCrJky2c
Another of my favourites from 2016 - Deborah Conway singing Bowie's 'Oh, You Pretty Things… https://t.co/iD3gK04FG9 https://t.co/BDwrlDAxGb
@iamjoncon Oh, well in THAT case. Blocked!
@IAMJONCON Opposite problem to yours - I just came to see something on your account and it said you were BLOCKED! Which I never did, obvs.
@kimaroundtown Fortunately it tends to cool down in the evening, and one bedroom’s not as bad as the other…!
@KimAroundTown Hmm, different issue here. Open plan apartment, air con downstairs, bedrooms upstairs ~10deg warmer...air con won't climb!
@kimaroundtown I’ve been trying to coax cold air upwards in Surry Hills for a while. Let me know if you figure something out…!
@palace_cinemas Is anyone (in Sydney particularly) doing a back-to-back Trainspotting / T2 screening? Because, well, I’d be there.
@gabrieldharmoo (But there I go applying my western sensibilities to unfamiliar music again, I suppose. Dang!)
@GabrielDharmoo And I stand by my comment that no-one has ever written or performed more enjoyable 12-tone music than I heard last night.
@sydney_festival Hope he appreciates a classic Simpsons reference!
After Measure for Measure, Fiery Maze & Anthropologies Imaginaires at @sydney_festival - if this is Wesley Enoch's… https://t.co/8TUBmdSvXK
@GabrielDharmoo I don't know if I can handle that sort of responsibility!
@GabrielDharmoo I was going to say @christianbok I my tweet as well, but ran out of space. Did you know he lives in Darwin, Aus these days?
@GabrielDharmoo @sydney_festival Thanks for coming all this way with such an amazing performance! Hope the remaining shows go well for you.
@sydney_festival @GabrielDharmoo Also, the kind of show that improves in the memory. Three hours later, I like it even more than I did then!
@sydney_festival @GabrielDharmoo It was really one of those Festival gems that catch you completely unawares. The kind you always HOPE for.
@JustJimWillDo It's more about the voices than the face; but @GabrielDharmoo does impressions of non-existent people, incredibly well.
(But really, @GabrielDharmoo defies description, so forget all that and just see the show. On at @sydney_festival until Sunday!)
(But YOUNG Jim Carrey, when he was wild & good. Even then only Canadians will get what I mean. So maybe Robin Williams.) @GabrielDharmoo
(If forced, I'd describe @GabrielDharmoo in Anthropologies Imaginaires as David Suzuki meets R. Murray Schaffer - performed by Jim Carrey.)
Had no idea what to expect from @GabrielDharmoo at @sydney_festival, but that's perfect. Fascinating, satirical, qu… https://t.co/6ETyvWAtup
@emilynussbaum @tarapalmeri So, basically... https://t.co/61PwhW5zP2
@LeighOGorman New Zealand - birthplace of McLaren, Hulme, Amon, and many more besides - stands ready for this challenge.
@mrjonathanking @toddatticus Are you hinting a sequel, here!?
@mrjonathanking But not French-Canadian - they would have been forced to translate the title there…
@mrjonathanking ‘Death On The Farm’ makes it sound like an Agatha Christie novel. Maybe it’s catchier in Spanish.
Been too long since I did a year-in-review blog - so here’s a few of my favourite images from 2016. Enjoy!… https://t.co/bV9QoG7Tu0
I found him! #elvis #blacktown #sydney #elvislives #carpark https://t.co/sdAkCPDapG https://t.co/NM6yJU0QiJ
Holy wow. Follow the links for some amazing Orson Welles production images from 1937…! #orsonwelles https://t.co/IYjQt9D8Np
@bencjenkins “Former Prime Minister Bob Hawke sculls his annual beer at the cricket.” Apply THAT one, anywhere else! https://t.co/EuIxtdzmvV
@Becs Back already, just going through the photos now! Quick Queenstown Christmas break...
So great to see (and hear!) tui and kereru again, over the holidays. Even found a few kaka… https://t.co/aziOB3KPt5 https://t.co/Xbf7aD7jl5
@RyanJGriffen @Dove_and_Olive in Surry Hills has been open since noon...
@MauriceHamilton Happy new year - hope it still beats working, in the words of the late great Eoin Young...!
@MichelleEdgerle Thanks!
@MichelleEdgerle Thanks! Few too many buildings, but that's Sydney for you, isn't it...
Hope everyone had a safe & enjoyable night. Happy new year! #sydnye #sydney #surryhills https://t.co/ZnQmwYcVBl https://t.co/pbPfU5CPgI
Tonight I'm going to party like it's...hmm. #sydnye #sydney #2017 #1702 https://t.co/Qcn3za5TcD https://t.co/EK5CA2iGaU
I waited until now to do my #2016bestnine - somehow I knew whatever I posted last would ma… https://t.co/gB9iscsMAq https://t.co/4EvMPu004O
@hayestheatre @highwayrunprod @MarikaAubrey Glad you like that one! Looking forward to more in 2017.
Queenstown. Where all traffic laws MUST be obeyed, unless you just reeeeeeally need chicke… https://t.co/7IAhuZst2D https://t.co/WyXwDsrVXL
@MrCamW It's the writers trying to jinx their own future / retirements...
@Torontomobilia (10 years later he finally succumbed and bought a Camry, and spent the NEXT 10 years telling everyone how amazing they are.)
@Torontomobilia My dad bought one of the last Custom Cruiser wagons when they were phased out in about '88, in that exact colour scheme...!
